Package com.pizzeria.training.controllers

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
com.pizzeria.training.controllers.OrderController
@RestController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
@RequestMapping("/orders")
public class OrderController
extends java.lang.Object
REST Controller class for Order object to interact with mongoDB database

    • updateOrder

      @PutMapping public com.pizzeria.training.models.Order updateOrder​(@RequestParam org.bson.types.ObjectId _id, @RequestBody com.pizzeria.training.models.Order updateOrder)
      Put method for updating order information
      Parameters:
      _id - MongoDB document Id to identify order to edit
      updateOrder - New order object to replace the one currently under the Id
      Returns:
      Saves updated order in the database

    • completeOrder

      @PatchMapping(path="/{orderId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> completeOrder​(@PathVariable("orderId") java.lang.String orderId)
      Patch method to update the status of an order to "complete"
      Parameters:
      orderId - Id of the order to mark as completed
      Returns:
      An updated order marked as complete

      @GetMapping(path="/{orderStatus}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<com.pizzeria.training.models.Order>> getOrdersByStatus​(@PathVariable("orderStatus") java.lang.String orderStatus)
      Get method for orders sorted by status
      Parameters:
      orderStatus - The status of the orders to be looked up
      Returns:
      A list of all orders with the given status
